abstract: Oleg V. Deripaska, the Russian oligarch whose aluminum firm Rusal raised $2.2 billion in an I.P.O. in January, is now mulling a move to list a power firm he controls in Hong Kong, Reuters reported.
snippet: Oleg V. Deripaska, the Russian oligarch whose aluminum firm Rusal raised $2.2 billion in an I.P.O. in January, is now mulling a move to list a power firm he controls in Hong Kong, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Russian oligarch Oleg V. Deripaska is reportedly mulling a move to list in Hong Kong an electric power generating company he controls.

headline.main: Russian Tycoon Said to Consider Another I.P.O.
